title: ISweepFeatureData.CircularProfile
description: Gets or sets whether to use a circular profile for this sweep feature.
returns: True to use a circular profile, false to use a sketch profile or tool body
remarks:
If this property is set to false, call
ISweepFeatureData::GetCutSweepOption
to determine the type of profile.
To get or set the diameter of a circular profile, use
ISweepFeatureData::CircularProfileDiameter
.
